reviews.review: This game has bullied me daily. I still get the flash backs of those who have t bagged my body. The game is based mostly on aim so dw about being good. This game is horrible, u must have a small brain to think about playing this game. The physics of this game completely broken u can be slowed when being shot like that makes no sense!!!! The aiming is so troll, not being able to head shot them while looking at the floor what is this. I hear so many voices while playing the game and little mics in pop up when a voice is heard, y the walls talking. Everytime I see a person I shoot them but then get kicked out of the game it says "team damage" and i get so confused please fix that.
Ну если хочешь слить все свои нервы, то бери

I enjoy csgo very much. It is much better than its competitor, valorant, in many ways. First it does not look like some cartoony game. Second, on ct side, there is no ak-47.

Un juegazo cagado por valve al no hacer nada con la comunidad.

Ben bu kadar hata veren, maç esnasında oyundan atan bir başka oyun görmedim. O yüzden kesinlikle alınmaması gerekiyor. İnsana saç baş yolduruyor. Maçta hata veriyor, atıyor. Daha sonra yeniden bağlan dediğinde bağlanmıyor tekrar hata veriyor. Bu sayede hem takımın yeniliyor hem sen ceza alıyorsun. Suçlu Valve ama cezasını biz çekiyoruz. Çok güzel...
